page.title: 12Hanham Social Survey Figures
page.content:
All of the children in the Junior section of Christchurch Primary School Hanham were questioned to get the following information about families:
{ 2.3}is the average number of children in each family { 48.3%}live in detached houses { 33.9%}live in semi-detached houes { 14.4%}live in terraced houses { 2.5%}live in flats { 2.6%}have no car { 56.8%}have one car { 40.7%}have two or more cars {100.o%}have a washing machine { 10.2%}have a dishwasher { 33.1%}have a microwave oven { 95.8%}have a freezer { 81.4%}have more than one television { 54.2%}have a video recorder { 52.5%}have a computer
